name: The Adventures of Wolf and Hood - A Jigsaw Tale
name_original: The Adventures of Wolf and Hood - A Jigsaw Tale
description:
The Adventures of Wolf and Hood - A Jigsaw Tale is a fairy tale story told through 20 beautiful hand illustrated jigsaw puzzles.

What else can you tell me

  • Follow familiar fairy tale characters in a brand new adventure
  • Choose from six different puzzle sizes, from 24 to 294 pieces
  • Progress is saved automatically so you can come back to a puzzle later
  • Take your time to admire the completed scenes and zoom in on the details
  • Subtle animated elements bring the scenes to life as you play
  • Read the whole completed story in Gallery Mode, like a real picture book
